verbose_text: The limited increase in ADAMTS13 activity (15.64 +/- 2.92% and 19.33 +/- 3.05% for R1 and R2, respectively; XREF_FIG) as compared with the larger increase in ADAMTS13 antigen levels (R1 : 0.58 +/- 0.06 mug/mL; R2 : 0.59 +/- 0.13 mug/mL; XREF_FIG), could not be explained by the presence of detectable inhibitory anti-ADAMTS13 autoantibodies during remission (XREF_FIG).
